segments.text: you look better today . How did your test go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: much better than it did yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I not only passed my test , but I aced it ! I'm so happy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you should be . You worked really hard last night preparing for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thanks for helping me with it . If you hadn't encouraged me to do my best , I wouldn't have ever been able to pass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you don't have to thank me . It's just a part of my job as your counsellor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did you always do well at school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , in fact , I was terrible at taking exams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , but my teachers always encouraged me to do the best that I could and that helped me a lot . When are your final exams ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll get my finals in two months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: when do you plan on studying for those exams ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: most students just cram the night forehead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you think that's a good idea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , I think I should study a little bit at a time , starting a few weeks before the exam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that sounds like a good idea . What are you going to do if you have any questions while you're studying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll go and talk to my professor or a learning support assistant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it sounds like you've learned something useful this year !
segments.speaker: S1
